chapter.text: 90|1|Wo yi zhege difang mengshi——
90|2|ni jiang zai nali, bu shou ji shu——
90|3|wo yi yige fuqin he tasuo sheng de zisun mengshi,
90|4|wo que yi ba ren chuangzao zai kunan li.
90|5|Ta yiwei renhe ren dou buneng zhifu ta ma?
90|6|Ta shuo:“Wo huafeile xuduo caichan!”
90|7|Ta yiwei renhe ren dou meiyou kanjian ta ma?
90|8|Nandao wo meiyou wei ta chuangzao liang zhi yanjing,
90|9|yitiao shetou, liang pian zuichun,
90|10|bing zhishi ta liang tiao mingxian de daolu ma?
90|11|Ta zenme bu chaoyue shan jing ne?
90|12|Ni zen neng zhidao chaoyue shan jing shi shenme shi?
90|13|Shi shifang nuli,
90|14|huo zai jihuang ri zhenji
90|15|qinqi de gu'er,
90|16|huo kun qiong de pinmin;
90|17|tongshi, ta shi yige xindao erqie xingshan, bing yi jianren xiang mian, yi ci min xiangzhu zhe.
90|18|Zhe deng ren shi xingfu de.
90|19|Buxin wo de jixiang zhe, shi boming de,
90|20|tamen jiang bei guan zai huo yu li.
